page.title: 10The School in Inchnadamph
page.content: The{single-teacher school}is situated by Loch Assynt.There has been a school here for over 200 years but the school house is no longer used as such. The old classroom is now a black_out room and canteen.No meals are served due to high cost and the 6 children eat packed lunches.The school is a demount -able unit which serves pupils (aged {5-12)}living within a radius of 16km but one family has to travel{21km}from Benmore Lodge. The highest roll was{23 and the lowest,2.Before a car was used some pupils walked 4km to school.Other teachers come to teach{art,gym and {music, including bagpipes.}There are many books, paper, paint, pens etc.,as well as{television, tape recorders, {slide projector, computer and piano. Hot water was installed in 1978 but at times of frost and drought water must be fetched from the well nearby!
